mapper.select: select seq_protector seqProtector, protector_id protectorId, protector_password protectorPassword, protector_name protectorName, protector_age protectorAge, protector_gender protectorGender, protector_address protectorAddress, protector_phoneNo protectorPhoneNo, protector_important_point protectorImportantPoint, protector_join_date protectorJoinDate, protector_role protectorRole, protector_update_date protectorUpdateDate, protector_leave_flag protectorLeaveFlag from Protector where seq_protector = #{seqProtector}
